title: Teach With Teachly
bgText: Before creating a Course, please read the terms of service

ideology.header: Teachly follows a free market styled aproach to courses
ideology.p1: Anyone can create a course, however this does not guarantee that any clients will buy your course.
ideology.p2: If your course gets bought and receives positive interactions, Teachly will promote your course to more users and exclusive benefits.
ideology.p3: If your course receives negative interactions it will be promoted less and may recieves penalties.
ideology.p4: If you are found attempting to exploit Teachly or are reported by users and found guilty, you may be banned.
